ingredients.item: ½ tsp caraway seeds, lightly crushed

instructions.step: 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Blanch the cauliflower in boiling water for 3 minutes and drain.
2. Meanwhile, put the oil in a roasting tin with the spices and onion, and roast for 5 minutes. Toss in the cauliflower and roast for 15 minutes. Mix in the parsley and season.
3. Brush the lamb with chutney and put under a preheated grill for 4â5 minutes each side. Serve with the cauliflower.
